OrgName: Volt Information Sciences, Inc. and all of its subsidiaries
activities: Volt and its affiliates and subsidiaries provide a full range of services including: Temporary/Contract Staffing, Direct Hire Staffing/Professional Placement, Business Analysis Tools, Data Warehousing, Technology and web based systems, wireless systems integration, computer system and LAN/WAN services and turnkey solutions to the telecommunications, cable and related industries. The data transferred to Volt and/or its US based affiliates and subsidiaries from our operations in the EU may be used for a variety of purposes including: providing staffing services to customers including tracking of applicant, time worked, invoicing, payrolling information, network access and recordkeeping and reporting: employment and career development services to individuals; tracking of employee payments, benefits and services offered for full time and temporary employees in our European operations. The data is collected and may be stored in the U.S. in support of the company's business activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) as we process human resources data.
